QuestData.Title: Gloriously Incandescent
QuestData.Description: I did not come here to fight, I have seen too many die already. I have killed so many with my own hands.$B$BI have come to seek the light, and redemption.$B$BThe arakkoa of this land worship the sun as I do. But they are a violent, isolationist, and decadent race, who seem to derive a different message than my own people. This troubles me.$B$BBring me one of their Sun Crystals. I wish to see this light.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect a Sun Crystal in Skyreach.
